HTML Hypertext Markup Language
Created by Tim Berners Lee in 1991.
HTML used to create web pages and design a web page.-web development tools
Latest version is HTML 5.
1.Environment setup:
--web browser- google browser
--code editor- VS code

models.py-allows you to persist /save all the details that we give in web page.
It must reload and save old details of Students(class name), even if we close the web page

take the data from student form and put into models.py then view it(diplay the student list in web page).
